main.component

Class EventChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.component.Dispatcher
      • main.component.EventChannel

  • public class EventChannel
extends Dispatcher
    Author:
    Suleyman Karatas - karatasuleyman@gmail.com

    EventChannel stores subscribers and publishers. Also provide channel to Dispatcher
